article_title: Analysis highlights high customer churn on Affordable Care Act exchanges
article_text:
Free Health Payer Daily Newsletter More than 38,000 health plan executives read FierceHealthPayer to stay current on trends in healthcare payment reform, cost containment strategies, the ICD-9/ICD-10 transition, fraud prevention, and more. Sign up for FREE today!

Click here to see a sample.

article_metadata.description: Health plans in the Affordable Care Act marketplace experience considerable turnover, with only a third of exchange enrollees picking the same plan for 2016 as they did for 2015, according to a new analysis from advisory firm Avalere.
